Testet 1000 times over 8 boards(3x3) in Visual Studio 2012 on Windows 8 64bit:

The board is represented as an array:
0,0,5,1,0,9,4,7,3,0,0,9,5,0,0,8,0,6,1,4,0,8,0,0,2,0,0,4,0,0,0,0,0,0,6,0,0,0,6,7,0,2,5,0,0,0,8,0,0,0,0,0,0,1,0,0,4,0,0,1,0,2,8,5,0,2,0,0,8,6,0,0,3,9,8,2,0,7,1,0,0

The board will then look like:
[
0,0,5, 1,0,9, 4,7,3,
0,0,9, 5,0,0, 8,0,6,
1,4,0, 8,0,0, 2,0,0,

4,0,0, 0,0,0, 0,6,0,
0,0,6, 7,0,2, 5,0,0,
0,8,0, 0,0,0, 0,0,1,

0,0,4, 0,0,1, 0,2,8,
5,0,2, 0,0,8, 6,0,0,
3,9,8, 2,0,7, 1,0,0
]
